explains: n. 导师辅导课；学习指南，教程
wordGroup: tutorial system n. 个别辅导制；大学导师制

sentences.en: There is an excellent tutorial section, which carefully walks you through how to play.
sentences.cn: 有一个非常好的使用指南，它仔细地教你怎么玩。

sentences.en: Before we can answer that question, you need to read my GRUB tutorial.
sentences.cn: 在我们回答这个问题以前，你需要阅读我的食物教程。
